sentences.en: And redshift depends on just how the universe is expanding.
sentences.cn: 并且红移取决于宇宙如何膨胀。

sentences.en: Redshift 1 refers to when the universe was half its present age.
sentences.cn: 当宇宙为目前一半的年龄时的红移值为1。

sentences.en: The object's apparent brightness yields the distance; its redshift yields the velocity.
sentences.cn: 这些天体的视亮度可以得到距离，它们的红移可以得出速度。
